title: Virtual
desc: To maximize the extent and impact of RoboReach, programs and instruction will be held solely online through live streams and videos.

title: Accessible
desc: Our programs are free for all to apply, and any materials needed in the course will be provided and shipped to your classrooms!

title: Free
desc: With sponsors from Google, Amazon, Facebook, and Boeing, all of our programs are free to everyone. All you have to do to sign up is apply!
